file.title: AMM PART II-1285 - CHAPTER 23-12-04-06 - VHF ANTENNA - INSPECTION/CHECK

page.data: AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL VHF ANTENNA - INSPECTION/CHECK EFFECTIVITY: ALL 1. General A. This section gives the procedures to do a visual inspection on the VHF Antenna. B. A General Visual Inspection (GVI) is a visual examination of an exterior area to find obvious irregular conditions. C. The procedures in this section are given in the sequence below. The tasks identified with ( ♦) are part of the Scheduled Maintenance Requirements Document (SMRD). TASK NUMBER DESCRIPTION EFFECTIVITY ALL 23-12-04-200-801-A ♦ VHF ANTENNA - INSPECTION EMB-145 - AMM 1285 General 23-12-04 Page 1 of 3 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 23-12-04-200-801-A EFFECTIVITY: ALL 2. VHF ANTENNA - INSPECTION A. General (1) This task gives the procedures for the general visual inspection of the VHF Antenna. (2) The inspection procedures are the same for the VHF Antennas I, II, and lll. B. References REFERENCE DESIGNATION AMM TASK 23-12-04-000-801-A/400 VHF ANTENNAS - REMOVAL AMM TASK 23-12-04-400-801-A/400 VHF ANTENNAS - INSTALLATION C. Zones and Accesses ZONE PANEL/DOOR LOCATION 132 Fuselage bottom - RH 243 Fuselage top - LH 253 Fuselage top - LH D. Tools and Equipment Not Applicable E. Auxiliary Items Not Applicable F. Consumable Materials Not Applicable G. Expandable Parts Not Applicable H. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 1 Does the task On the aircraft I. Preparation SUBTASK 841-002-A (1) Make sure that the aircraft is safe for maintenance. (2) On the circuit breaker panel, open the circuit breakers listed below and attach a DO- NOT-CLOSE tag to them: • VHF 1 (Location Tip: ESSENTIAL DC BUS 1/COMM/VHF 1). • VHF 2 (Location Tip: DC BUS 2/COMM/VHF 2). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 200-801-A/600 23-12-04 Page 2 of 3 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL • (Aircraft with VHF 3 system) VHF 3 (Location Tip: DC BUS 1/COMM/VHF 3). J. Visual Inspection of the VHF Antenna SUBTASK 212-002-A (1) Examine the VHF Antenna for cracks. NOTE: Independently of the quantity of cracks found, only replace the VHF antenna if a crack extends across all the width of the leading edge. (a) If you find a crack and it extends across all the width of the leading edge, replace the VHF Antenna, as follows: – Remove the VHF Antenna ( AMM TASK 23-12-04-000-801-A/400). – Install a new VHF Antenna ( AMM TASK 23-12-04-400-801-A/400). K. Follow-on SUBTASK 842-002-A (1) On the circuit breaker panel, close the circuit breakers listed below and remove the DO-NOT-CLOSE tag from them: • VHF 1 (Location Tip: ESSENTIAL DC BUS 1/COMM/VHF 1). • VHF 2 (Location Tip: DC BUS 2/COMM/VHF 2). • (Aircraft with VHF 3 system) VHF 3 (Location Tip: DC BUS 1/COMM/VHF 3).
